notifications.backendConnectionWarning: Unable to connect to Unmanic backend. Please check that it is running.
notifications.failedToLogout: Failed to log current user out of installation.
notifications.failedToFetchSettings: Failed to fetch Unmanic's current settings.
notifications.failedToFetchSystemConfig: Failed to fetch Unmanic's system configuration.
notifications.failedToFetchLibraryList: Failed to fetch Unmanic's library list.
notifications.failedToInstallPlugin: An error was encountered while attempting to install the requested plugin.
notifications.reposRefreshFailure: Unable to update your configured repositories. Perhaps there is an error in one of the URLs?
notifications.repoRemovedFailed: Something went wrong while trying to remove repository.
notifications.failedToFetchEnabledDataPanelPlugins: Failed to fetch the enabled data panel plugins list
notifications.allowPopups: Please allow popups for this website.
notifications.invalidWorkerEvent: Unable to add invalid worker event.
notifications.remoteInstallationAlreadyInList: The address you entered is already in the list of remote installations.
notifications.invalidRemoteInstallationAddress: The address you entered was not a valid Unmanic installation.
notifications.incompatibleRemoteInstallation: The remote Unmanic installation that you are trying to add is not compatible with linking. Try updating it first.
notifications.rescanLibraryError: An error was encountered while requesting a library rescan

serverMessages.incompatiblePlugin: Unmanic has stopped processing tasks as it has detected an incompatible plugin enabled on one of your libraries
serverMessages.libraryEnabledLimits: Unmanic has stopped processing tasks as you have too many libraries configured for a non-supporter tier. Consider sponsoring the project to enable more than 2 libraries.
serverMessages.pluginSettingsChangeWorkersStopped: Unmanic has stopped all workers as it has detected a change to the plugins configuration. When you are ready, resume the workers from the dashboard.
serverMessages.pendingTaskHaltedPostProcessorQueueFull: The Post-processor queue reached its limit
serverMessages.pendingTaskHaltedPostProcessorQueueFullM: Workers will not receive a new pending task until the Post-processor queue drops below the current configured worker count
serverMessages.linkedInstallationLimits: Unmanic has stopped processing tasks as you have linked too many remote installations for a non-supporter tier. Consider sponsoring the project to link more than one remote installation.

tooltips.defaultLibrary: This is the default library. It cannot be deleted.

library.name: Name (must be unique)
library.confirmRemove: Removing the library will also remove all settings associated with this library. Are you sure you wish to continue?
library.runLibraryScanOnStart: Run a one off library scan on startup
library.clearPendingTasksOnStart: Clear all pending tasks on startup
library.enableReceiveRemoteFilesOnly: Configure Library for receiving remote files only
library.pathDisabledReceiveRemoteFilesOnly: Option disabled as you have configured this library for receiving remote files only
library.enableScanner: Enable library scanner for this library
library.enableInotify: Enable file monitor for this library
library.priorityScore: Set a priority score modifier for tasks generated for this library
library.importPluginConfigMessage: Importing library configuration. This may take some time if there are any plugins that require installation.
library.unlocked: The library is able to be deleted
library.maxAgeOfCompletedTasks: Maximum number of days to keep completed tasks

workers.confirmRemove: Removing the worker group will also remove all settings associated with the group. Are you sure you wish to continue?
workers.locked: The worker group cannot be deleted
workers.unlocked: The worker group is able to be deleted

link.syncTipBody: When you have configured your installation name and public address, and you are logged into your Unmanic account as a project supporter, your installation will automatically populate the remote installations list for your other linked installations. For this to work, you must ensure your public address is accessible by your other installations.
link.name: Name
link.allowReceivingTasks: Receive tasks from this installation when workers are available
link.allowSendingTasks: Send tasks to this installation when workers are available
link.enableTaskPreloading: Preload some tasks on the remote installation Pending Tasks queue
link.enableConfigMissingLibraries: Automatically configure missing libraries on the remote installation
link.enableDistributedWorkerCount: Enable distributed worker count for this link

workers.listEmpty: There are no workers currently running. Increase the worker count in Unmanic's settings to spawn a worker.
workers.workerPausedFailed: Unmanic was unable to pause this worker for some reason
workers.workerResumedFailed: Unmanic was unable to resume this worker for some reason
workers.terminateWorkerWarning: Are you sure you want to terminate this worker and its current task? The current task will be marked as failed in the completed task list.
workers.workerTerminationFailed: Unmanic was unable to terminate this worker for some reason

completedTasks.errorGettingDetails: An error was encountered while fetching the details for this task
completedTasks.addToPendingTasksList: Add selected to Pending Tasks list
completedTasks.selectLibraryToAdd: Select library in which to recreate this task

plugins.name: Name
plugins.failedToOpenPluginInfo: An error was encountered while attempting to open plugin info
plugins.author: Author
plugins.rateLimitExceeded: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
plugins.errorSavingFlow: An error was encountered while saving the Plugin Flow
plugins.invalidZipFile: File is not a valid ZIP file
plugins.failedToInstallPluginFromZip: Failed to install plugin from the uploaded ZIP file

libraryManagement.fileTestCaption: These plugins are called to test if files should be added to the pending task list

postprocessor.fileMoveCaption: These plugins are called on completion of task to add additional file movements
postprocessor.taskResultCaption: These plugins are called on the completion of a task to mark the overall success or failure of that task

worker.processCaption: These plugins are called by a worker and produce a custom command to be executed and managed by that worker

dataPanels.noDataPanelsEnabled: You do not have any Data Panels enabled. Install one from your plugin settings.

trialWelcome.welcomeMessage: You are currently running a full-featured trial version of this application.
trialWelcome.trialInfo: For the next 14 days, you have unlimited access to all features.
trialWelcome.centralBody: Unmanic Central is the official platform for collecting logs and metrics from all your Unmanic installations. Features include:

centralPoints.logs: Aggregate logs across servers in one place
centralPoints.grafana: Present metrics in Grafana with ready-to-use data sources
centralPoints.dashboards: Use the built-in dashboards for a simple overview

trialWelcome.supportBody: Check the docs for setup guides or join the community for help and tips.
trialWelcome.limitationsTitle: After the trial ends, some features are limited for non-supporters.
trialWelcome.limitationsBody: Unmanic is free and open source, and supporters help keep the project healthy. Supporter status can be earned by contributing in many ways, including documentation or helping others in Discord. Financial support is not required. See the feature comparison for what supporter access unlocks.
trialWelcome.enjoy: We hope you enjoy using Unmanic!

loginDialog.intro: Unmanic is a free and open-source product brought to you by Streaming Tech. While basic features can be used without logging in, signing in unlocks additional features if you support any of the Streaming Tech open-source projects.

github.title: GitHub:
github.body: Contributing, even a small documentation fix, on our repositories (github.com/Unmanic, github.com/Steam-Headless, or github.com/DeckSettings) bumps your account to a supporter tier for a month.

discord.title: Discord:
discord.body: Being active and helpful in our Discord server earns reputation points and upgrades your account to a supporter tier.

patreon.title: Patreon:
patreon.body: Financially backing the project on Patreon unlocks exclusive channels in Discord for discussing future developments and elevates your account to a supporter tier.

loginDialog.codePrompt: Your unique login code has been generated below. Please click the button to open a new window where you can enter this code to authenticate and link this installation to your account.
loginDialog.noteLineOne: Streaming Tech is the umbrella organisation for all open-source GitHub projects by Josh Sunnex (Josh.5).
loginDialog.noteLineTwo: Sponsorship funds (e.g., via Patreon) are used to hire or contract outside help, maintain infrastructure, and fuel my coffee addiction.
loginDialog.noteLineThree: Supporting Unmanic also sustains our wider free and open-source development.
